name: Dumb As Wizards
description: Dumb as Wizards is a hilariously crazy online and local multiplayer, arena brawler. Whale on your friends with crazy spells in a shrinking arena to be the last wizard standing! You're a wizard, Dummy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 10/8/7/Vista/XP Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: SM3 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Best played with controllers. Internet only required for online play.
